high_descs: Turn to the right, step closer to the desk.
Pick up the brown and black object on the desk.
Turn to the right, walk to the desk across the room.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: View the black and brown object in the light.

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the wooden desk.
Pick up the closest notebook off of the wooden desk.
Turn right and walk over to the small lamp on a wooden desk.
Turn on the light of the small lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a notebook in the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the right to face the side of the desk
Pick up the clock that is sitting on the desk
Turn to the right and cross the room to the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Look at a clock by the light of a lamp

high_descs: Turn around and stand next to the desk.
Pick up the package from the desk.
Carry the package to the desk with the computer.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Turn the lamp on while holding a package.

high_descs: Turn to the right.
Pick up the book on the counter.
Turn right and walk to the desk.
Turn on the desk light.
anns.task_desc: Look at a book under the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn to your right to face the end of the desk
Pick up the book from the desk
Turn right and walk over to the desk
Turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the book under the light of the lamp
